attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The recently introduced logo for the London 2012 Olympics looks awful. It is an embarrassment for the country and the people.  The original London 2012 Logo was far better than the newly designed one!!! 

We call on the Prime Minister to change the London 2012 Olympics Logo or return back to the old one!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
